Author: ifuckpineapples
Text: keep in mind that food and water weight can majorly affect your body. like, majorly. I seriously felt like I gained a full five pounds after a weekend of overeating, but one normal day later, I used the bathroom many times (hydrate yo) had a big poop and my weight hadn't even changed from before the weekend started. I'm sure your body is still getting used to eating more and handling it all. I know it's frustrating, but be patient and it'll all turn out well

Author: SilentProtagonist16
Text: Recovery is hard and painful, I’m in treatment and am forced to be weighed every week, I’m both terrified of it going up and of it going down due to worries of being thrown into inpatient. I’m really proud of you for starting the journey and managing to eat intuitively, I can’t stop calorie counting right now. Good luck to you and I hope you feel better soon, you’re doing great<3
